root.name: Mario Tennis Open
root.description: OverviewMario Tennis Open is a new Camelot-developed entry in the Mario Tennis series for the 3DS. The game will feature gyroscope controls, region-specific online multiplayer via Nintendo Network as well as local 4-Player multiplayer.Playable characters include:MarioYoshiPeachDaisyLuigiBowserBowser Jr.BooWarioWaluigiDonkey KongDiddy KongBaby MarioBaby PeachLumaDry BowserSome characters are only available via QR codes, and they include:Blue YoshiRed YoshiYellow YoshiPink YoshiLight Blue YoshiBlack YoshiWhite YoshiMetal MarioCompatible 3DS FeaturesNintendo NetworkMii SupportLocal Play (2-4 Player VS/Co-op)Online Play (2-4 Player VS/Co-op)StreetPassSingle Card Download Play (2-4 Player VS/Co-op)eShop VersionSize: 4,096 Blocks (512 MB)

similar_games.game: Hot Shots Tennis: Get a Grip
